modules.name: CheeseGrater
modules.description: A granular sample and loop. Craft the exact right slice of sound for your music.

modules.name: Blender
modules.description: A Distortion Looper. Play with 4 main knobs to snapshot dynamic effects.

modules.name: Spork
modules.description: A granular FX module. Modulate 6 different granular effects.

modules.name: Sifter
modules.description: A granular mixer. Sample 4 sound sources and recombine them endlessly through modulation.

modules.name: SporkExpander
modules.description: Expander for Spork. Adds mixing different modes at the same time.

modules.name: SifterExpander
modules.description: Expander for Sifter. Adds panning and volume controls per channel.

modules.name: BlenderExpander
modules.description: Expander for Blender. Adds more control over how the loop plays.

modules.name: CheeseGraterExpander
modules.description: Expander for CheeseGrater. Adds control over which part of the sample plays and more ways to modify how it plays.
